Dorm Life
Academic Rigor
Tips for prospective students
In three sentences
Comments
The officers take their jobs seriously so always have your ID ready.
EVERYONE! There are all types of people on campus. It's so versatile.
Well worth taking out fin aid or loans. The education that you can receive there will last a life time and the relationships you will create are well worth more than you'd ever have to pay.
The clubs are exceptional. There is literally a club for anything and everything you could think of or would like to do. I personally enjoy belly dancing, poetry, and anime!
Love the cafe, and all the options that are in the campus area too!
I don't live on campus, but I have heard it's pretty awesome, however it is pricey.

Every student I have had the pleasure of coming into contact with at Brooklyn College has a passion for their major or just learning in general that is exceptional. The professors are excellent at engaging this as well.
Talk to someone in admission as much as possible. Let it be known that you are really interested in being a student there. Dedication is key.
The absolute best school for a variety of education and advancement in the real world. The people staff and students alike are open minded, passionate, and excited about gaining and giving knowledge!

textAfterTable: Comments Great for these types of students outgoing, likes to meet people Tips for prospective students sometimes it got difficult for me but if you make friends with other kids in your class, you can make study groups which is VERY helpful Am enjoying being here as long as you choose your professors wisely and take advantage of academic advisement to set u your class schedule, you'll enjoy the environment and diversity Am learning a lot i have absorbed more information than i have ever absorbed in my entire life Login to rate or flag the reviews Kelly from New York, NY 05/16/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 4 out of 4 people found this review useful. 3 of 58 Categories Comments What to do for fun There is always some group on the lawn playing hakki sack, jamming
